short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keyword research tool for Etsy. Collect, save and research Etsy search bar suggestions with this keyword tool.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Collect, save and research Etsy search bar suggestions with this keyword tool.
Keyword research tool for Etsy. Improve your shop's SEO and marketing strategies, listings tags and titles, etc.

****************************************************************
> Install ESB Saver Chrome extension

**********
START

Click [ESB] button for activation. It's on Chrome toolbar or available through [Extensions] button -> dropdown. 
([Extensions] button - It's the icon that looks like a small puzzle piece next to the profile avatar. The dropdown shows all the extensions installed and enabled in Chrome.)

**********
DATA COLLECTION
Use the ESB Saver block with controls below the search bar.

Please follow these steps:
1. Start typing a keyword in the search bar.
2. When a drop-down list with useful suggestions appears, press the [Shift] button to add them to your collection.
3. Repeat steps 1 and 2 until you run out of the prepared list of keywords or your imagination.

Additionally, you can add keywords from a previous task if they have been saved.

**********
DATA VIEWING AND EDITING
Click the [Show Collected Keywords] button to display the collected keywords in the mini editor. 
Your current list of keywords will also be saved in history.

You can remove useless keywords before saving.

**********
DATA EXPORT
Click the [Copy to Clipboard] button to export the collected keywords.
Your current list of keywords will also be saved in history.
 
The copied keywords are ready to be pasted into:
* Google Sheets
* Excel 
* Text editors (Notepad, etc.). 

****************************************************************

This is a way to improve SEO for Etsy sellers.
You can use these Etsy Chrome Extension for the following purposes:
• ETSY shop
--- KEYWORD RESEARCH FOR NEW TITLES / TAGS
--- improvement of the performance on your Etsy shop
--- checking the validity of existing tags/keywords
--- supplement texts for your shop with new words
--- Etsy analytics in editable files
--- third-party keyword solutions
--- third-party search analytics solutions
--- third-party data validation services (GarnyaKey etc.)
• Google
--- improvement of SEO for Google search engines, etc.
• Marketing
--- understanding how customers think when looking for information
--- improvement of marketing strategies

ATTENTION!
For the best Etsy keyword research results use USEO and GarnyaKey services. This Etsy keyword tool helps to improve SEO for skilled sellers. 

Regular keyword research is very useful for all sellers on the Internet.

****************************************************************

This Etsy keyword tool is not a service provided by Etsy.
